page.title: 17HASELEY KNOB:THEN AND NOW-1
page.content: {MRS.DAFFERN}has lived in the village for many years.She feels that people were happier half a century ago than they are now. Because they had less money,they never found it a problem, and they did not feel they had to lock their house when they went out. {TRANSPORT}has changed immensely. Bicycles used to be the main means of transport because they were cheap.As people grew wealthier,motor bikes became popular,then vans and now cars. {SHOPPING.}One small shop and Post Office served each family adequately. The older generation did not like helping themselves in supermarkets; they felt that they were taking things that were not rightly theirs. The village shop used to be open from 8am until 6pm with only one half-day.Now the Post Office only opens Mon.Tues.& Thursdays from 9am-12noon.
